program combined

    implicit none

    integer :: N, M, k, i, j, s, x, p, ans1, t, result

    integer, parameter :: MOD = 1000000007

    integer, allocatable :: a(:)

    character(len=20) :: s_str

    integer, dimension(0:20, 0:1) :: dp

    ! First part: compute ans1

    read *, N, M

    allocate(a(N))

    a = 0

    do i = 1, M

        read *, k

        do j = 1, k

            read *, s

            a(s) = ior( a(s), (2**(i-1)) )

        end do

    end do

    p = 0

    do i = 1, M

        read *, x

        p = ior( p, (x * (2**(i-1))) )

    end do

    ans1 = 0

    do s = 0, 2**N -1

        t = 0

        do i = 1, N

            if (btest(s, i-1)) then

                t = ieor(t, a(i))

            end if

        end do

        if (t == p) then

            ans1 = ans1 +1

        end if

    end do

    ! Convert ans1 to string

    write(s_str, '(i0)') ans1

    integer :: n = len_trim(s_str)

    ! Initialize DP array

    dp = 0

    dp(0,0) = 1

    ! Process each character in the string

    do i = 1, n

        character(1) :: current_char = s_str(i:i)

        if (current_char == '0') then

            dp(i,0) = dp(i-1,0)

            dp(i,1) = dp(i-1,1)

        else

            dp(i,0) = 0

            dp(i,1) = mod( dp(i-1,0) + dp(i-1,1), MOD )

        end if

        if (current_char == '0') then

            dp(i,1) = mod( dp(i,1) + mod( dp(i-1,1)*2, MOD ), MOD )

        else

            dp(i,0) = mod( dp(i,0) + mod( dp(i-1,0)*2, MOD ), MOD )

            dp(i,1) = mod( dp(i,1) + mod( dp(i-1,1)*2, MOD ), MOD )

        end if

        dp(i,0) = mod( dp(i,0), MOD )

        dp(i,1) = mod( dp(i,1), MOD )

    end do

    result = mod( dp(n,0) + dp(n,1), MOD )

    print *, result

    deallocate(a)

end program combined
